subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yasiel Puig and Juan Uribe each tied career highs with four hits apiece to lead the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers to a 9-4 victory over the Minnesota Twins.
snippet: Yasiel Puig and Juan Uribe each tied career highs with four hits apiece to lead the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers to a 9-4 victory over the Minnesota Twins.
